attributes.action: POLICE REFORM NEEDS PARLIAMENTARY DEBATE RE. SERIOUS OFFENDING IN ALL RANKS.
attributes.additional_details:
National Recruitment/training/ discipline reform needed for better public confidence. 
Decent police deserve respect&support.
Rotten apples need removing.  
Our family has three generations former/serving police & support decent majority but serious misconduct/criminality UK-wide in all ranks in recent years.Last Police Act 14yrs ago.
Facebook: policing-reform-petition@mail.com for detailed report
or email: policing-reform-petition.mail.com. 

PLEASE SIGN COMMONS DEBATE PETITION & INVITE OTHERS.
attributes.background:
College of Policing lists offences:- 
motoring, theft,violence/drugs/fraud/paedophilia in England&Wales. 
In Met Police:178 convicted  from 2012-2015, 54 serving,10 awaiting misconduct verdicts when data compiled.HMIC:75% child sexual abuse cases dealt with inadequately,children at  ‘serious risk’

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. We're not sure what reforms you would like the House of Commons to debate. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
